name: Shoot for the Stars (Canaguia)
description:
Description

Take control of a celestial arrow and help it hit it's various marks across the galaxy.

Exploit the gravitational-pull of nearby celestial bodies to guide your shots and let your arrows strike true!

Gameplay Tips

Here are some tips that may help you on your way

General tips:

  • You can reset the position of your arrow by pressing R
  • You can vary the initial speed of your arrow by pulling your bow back a shorter distance

Level-specific tips (spoilers):

  • Event-Horizon - (try aiming for the outer-most edge of the field)
  • Slow-and-steady - (try a mixture of low-powered shots aimed at the outer-most edge of the first planet)
